values:
HELLO. i'm not using this livejournal anymore.

 

add .

 

 

bye, lovlies. <3.

FRIENDS CUT. if you're listed here, then you're going to be cut. i'm going to start writing kind of more personal entries in here so yeahhhh. if you want to keep reading my entries, give me a good reason why you should stay. ::: EDIT ::: i added reasons.. ____jaded - we don't talk allywally_328 - ditto burgandynymph - ditto cow_utter - ditto crimson_tearsx - it's kind of weird cause i asked you to add me, but it doesn't seem like you read my entries. :\ sorry..? <3 emanc2k - ehhhhhh. facingrealitys - i don't know you at all, and i asked you to IM me, but you didn't, i dunno, maybe you didn't have acess to the internet or whatever. hurleyboarder11 - ehhhhhhh. fiendzerox - wayyyy to dirty for me. =P hahahah jkkkkkkk. yeah well, i don't know you that well i guess.. glowingmoon630 - we don't talk m0chimaroh - ditto n1njakid - ditto ne_hin_bin - ditto nonfatmilk - ditto pieceofmys2 - ditto pigaloo - ditto w0nt0n121389 - you don't seem to read my entries sooo whatev. yep.

comment to be added, but DON'T ask me to add you if: - you want to make your friends list look longer - you can't type correctly. i.e. "u" is NOT you, and no diz, wif, lolz, kewl, any of those words. LEARN TO SPELL, PEOPLE. - be intrested in what i have to say. don't tell me what i think is wrong, and don't tell me what i write is stupid. if you don't like it, get the fuck out. - look at my userinfo. if we have at least 5 things in common, then comment. if we have nothing in common, give me a reason why i should add you. [but chances are, i'll add you anyways. we'll find some common ground sooner or later.] if i decide to add you, you will be in a week or sooner. xoxo - evelyn.
